title: Factory Worker
description: A person working in a factory setting, depicted as wearing overalls and protective headgear while holding an active welding gun.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the factory worker emoji is portrayed with a determined and industrious demeanor, wearing a hard hat and work clothes that benefit from Apple‚Äôs characteristic smooth gradients and realistic lighting, giving them a sturdy, utilitarian appearance. The emoji‚Äôs robust design and grounded posture convey a sense of dedication, hard work, and the vital contribution of labor to progress, often used to acknowledge effort or discuss industrial themes.
